section.title: Creating a Chargeback Report
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine allows you to create chargeback reports to monitor costs you charged.

step.para: On the Columns tab, fill out the Basic Report Info area.

listitem.para: Type a unique name in Menu Name for how you want the report described in the menu list.
Type the Title to display on the report.

step.para: Add fields in the Configure Report Columns area.

listitem.para: From the Base the report on list, select Chargebacks.

Select the fields to include in the report from the Available Fields list, then click
(Move selected fields down). In addition to the fields, you can also select any tags that you have created and assigned.

Change the order of the fields in the report by clicking
(Move selected fields up) or
(Move selected fields down).

step.para: Click the Formatting tab to set the size of paper for a PDF and column header format.

listitem.para: From the PDF Output area, select the page size from the Page Size list.
From Specify Column Headers and Formats, type the text to display for each field. For each numeric field, you can also set the numeric format.

step.para: Click the Filter tab to set filters for the data displayed in the report.

listitem.para: From Chargeback Filters, select how you want the costs to show, the tag category, the tag, and how you want the items grouped.
From Chargeback Interval, select the time interval. You must have a full interval worth of data in order to select an option other than Partial in the Daily Ending With list.

step.para: Click the Preview tab, and then Load to see what the report will look like.
When you are satisfied that you have the report that you want, click Add to create the new report.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The new report is created. To make the report accessible from the Report menu, you must add it to a report menu. For more information on how to customize Report menus, see Insight Guide.
